title: Anderson Direct & Digital Hires Greg Schnieders, VP, Strategy & Client Relations
text:
Anderson Direct & Digital 
POWAY, Calif., Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Anderson Direct & Digital (Anderson) has hired Greg Schnieders as VP, Strategy & Client Relations. In his role, Schnieders will be responsible for nurturing client relationships, providing strategic direction to the account team, and overall account development and retention. Schnieders brings his twenty-six years of extensive experience in lead generation, account management, sales and marketing plan creation, and much more to Anderson along with a commitment to delivering superior customer-focused solutions. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150910/265401LOGO 
"We are excited for Greg Schnieders to join the Anderson family," said Scott Hopkins, Executive Vice President of Anderson. "Greg's ability to leverage his considerable background in direct mail services and his reputation as a sales and marketing leader has enabled him to hit the ground running with Anderson to deliver the excellent client experience we are known for." 
As a veteran business development and key account manager, Greg has a keen ability to effectively manage the development of multi-faceted projects for a wide spectrum of clients and deliver top-digit gains in revenue, making him an invaluable asset to the Anderson team. 
With decades of expertise in direct, digital and database marketing, Anderson inspires their target audience to take action and deepen their relationship with your brand, while delivering a strong and measurable lifetime value. Services include: marketing strategy, creative services, data intelligence, digital marketing, and media planning as well as direct and production services. Anderson is ranked as one of the top 20 DM agencies in the country by DM News . In both 2013 and 2014, Anderson was voted a Union-Tribune Top Workplace. For more information on Anderson, visit www.andersonDD.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/anderson-direct--digital-hires-greg-schnieders-vp-strategy--client-relations-300140999.html
